keyMoments.title: Alliance with Heart Pirates Formed
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially form an alliance with the Heart Pirates, led by Trafalgar Law, to take down one of the Four Emperors.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most significant partnerships in the series, setting up multiple arcs and changing the balance of power in the New World.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Alliance with Straw Hat Pirates Formed
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates, led by Trafalgar Law, officially form an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates to take down Kaido.
keyMoments.significance: Forms a powerful alliance that becomes crucial to the events of Punk Hazard, Dressrosa, and Wano arcs.

keyMoments.title: Plan to Defeat Kaido Revealed
keyMoments.description: Trafalgar Law reveals his plan to take down Kaido, one of the Four Emperors, acknowledging a 30% chance of success.
keyMoments.significance: Sets the long-term strategic goal for the Heart Pirates and their alliance.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a fur hat similar to Law's with crossed bones behind it
